title: Welcome to My Blog
excerpt: Welcome to my new blog! Here, I'll be sharing my thoughts and experiences in AI, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering.

title: My Journey into AI Engineering
excerpt: Reflecting on my path from a curious computer science student to an AI engineer, I have realized how much the field has evolved. The challenges and opportunities in AI continue to inspire me every day.

title: Building Scalable ML Systems
excerpt: A deep dive into the architecture and design principles behind building machine learning systems that can scale. From model deployment to monitoring and maintenance.

title: The Evolution of Computer Vision
excerpt: Exploring the fascinating journey of computer vision technology, from traditional image processing to modern deep learning approaches.
